summary: Esther Robinson's portrait of her uncle Danny Williams -- Warhol's onetime lover, collaborator and filmmaker in his own right -- offers a exploration of the Factory era, an homage to Williams's talent, a journey of family discovery and a compelling inquiry into Williams's mysterious disappearance at age 27.
cast: Callie Angell|Brigid Berlin|John Cale|Danny Fields|Nat Finkelstein|Gerard Malanga|Albert Maysles|Paul Morrissey|Billy Name|Ronald Nameth|Julia Robinson|Jeffrey Noyes Scher|Harold Stevenson|Chuck Wein|Danny Williams|Nadia Williams
director: Director: Esther Robinson (as Esther B. Robinson)
title: A Walk Into the Sea: Danny Williams and the Warhol Factory
